channel.title: Need help with compile/runserver
channel.description:
Ok, i followed the "Hamachi Guide + No-ip guide And how to make a Hamachi server" topic but im having some problems... i downloaded the latest version of jdk. i have jdk1.6.0, jre1.5.0_09, and jre1.6.0 in my java folder. and i edited the compile.bat and replaced it with: [code]@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" %java% java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
When i open it, it says: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:java Press any key to continue...[/code]
In my runserver.bat i edited it and replaced it with: [code]@echo off title Treyscape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
When i open this it quickly closes
any help would be greatly appreciated :D thnx in advance, -Trey

item.title: Need help with compile/runserver
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_Neonscape Owner Of Neonscape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_Neonscape wrote:

well first u dont need the run server thing cause i dont use it. Replace ur compiler with

[scar]@echo off
title (Yourservernamehere)
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause[/scar][br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 03:56:04 PM[/size][hr]hope that helped.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Fire_tar wrote:

add pause under then end of it

item.title: Need help with compile/runserver
item.dc:creator: @crazygreenfool crazygreenfool
item.description:
@crazygreenfool wrote:

Ok, i followed the “Hamachi Guide + No-ip guide And how to make a Hamachi server” topic but im having some problems…
i downloaded the latest version of jdk. i have jdk1.6.0, jre1.5.0_09, and jre1.6.0 in my java folder.
and i edited the compile.bat and replaced it with:

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" %java% java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

When i open it, it says:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:java Press any key to continue...

In my runserver.bat i edited it and replaced it with:

@echo off title Treyscape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

When i open this it quickly closes

any help would be greatly appreciated
thnx in advance,
-Trey
